title: [Minecraft.net|INSIDER]关于下界你不知道的10件事
author: Ziang39
txt_content:
本帖最后由 MR.11 于 2020-7-5 07:28 编辑 

10 THINGS YOU DIDN'T KNOW ABOUT THE NETHER10件关于下界你不知道的事


OK, OK, so the revelations in this video aren't that spine-chilling. There’s no footage of me in the shower or anything like that. But for the seventh episode of 10 Things You Probably Didn’t Know About Minecraft, we’ve been brave enough to visit the Nether! Discover who's banned from the Nether for life, how Piglin bartering will work, and the dating game we should be making instead of the Nether update.好啦好啦，这个视频里揭露的东西没有那个可怕。里面没我洗澡的镜头或者诸如此类的东西。但是为了第17集的“关于Minecraft你不知道的10件事”，我们足够勇敢去闯下界了！发现谁被终身监禁在下界，獠牙猪人是怎么工作的。还有代替下界更新的“dating game”Click the handsome hoglin below to watch it:点击下方帅气的野猪人观看：
视频在这https://youtu.be/EtKcphC4fIc





Want more great Minecraft videos? Click here to subscribe to our YouTube channel!






想看更多优秀的Minecraft视频？点击这里（上方）订阅我们的油管频道吧！
